languages.text: {n}Во взгляде Авеля читается мягкая снисходительность, весьма странная в текущей ситуации.{/n} "Гордыня разума побуждает его творить монументы самому себе. Не сожалей, ибо все предрешено итерацией..." {n}Техножреца прерывает приступ надсадного кашля, из груди слышен звон лопающегося металла.{/n}

{n}There is a look of gentle condescension in Abel's eyes — strange, given the circumstances.{/n} "The hubris of the mind spurs him to build monuments to himself. Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

Не сожалей, ибо все предрешено итерацией..." {n}Техножреца прерывает приступ надсадного кашля, из груди слышен звон лопающегося металла.{/n}

Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst eine freundliche Herablassung in Abels Augen ... seltsam, wenn man die Umstände bedenkt.{/n} "Die Hybris des Verstandes bringt ihn dazu, sich selbst Denkmäler zu setzen. Ihr müsst nichts bedauern, den alles ist vorherbestimmt ..."{n}Ein heftiger Hustenanfall lässt ihn verstummen und du hörst das heisere Kratzen von Metall in seiner Brust.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a look of gentle condescension in Abel's eyes — strange, given the circumstances.{/n} "The hubris of the mind spurs him to build monuments to himself. Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst eine freundliche Herablassung in Abels Augen ... seltsam, wenn man die Umstände bedenkt.{/n} "Die Hybris des Verstandes bringt ihn dazu, sich selbst Denkmäler zu setzen. Ihr müsst nichts bedauern, den alles ist vorherbestimmt ..."{n}Ein heftiger Hustenanfall lässt ihn verstummen und du hörst das heisere Kratzen von Metall in seiner Brust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abel a un regard un peu condescendant, ce qui paraît étrange vu les circonstances.{/n} « Son esprit orgueilleux le pousse à s'ériger des monuments à sa gloire. N'ayez pas de regrets, car tout est prédéterminé par l'itération... » {n}dit-il avant d'être interrompu par une violente quinte de toux, provoquant un bruit de déchirement métallique audible dans sa poitrine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a look of gentle condescension in Abel's eyes — strange, given the circumstances.{/n} "The hubris of the mind spurs him to build monuments to himself. Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel a un regard un peu condescendant, ce qui paraît étrange vu les circonstances.{/n} « Son esprit orgueilleux le pousse à s'ériger des monuments à sa gloire. N'ayez pas de regrets, car tout est prédéterminé par l'itération... » {n}dit-il avant d'être interrompu par une violente quinte de toux, provoquant un bruit de déchirement métallique audible dans sa poitrine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}亚伯温和的目光中流露出了屈尊俯就的意味。考虑到眼下的情况，他的神色相当不同寻常。{/n}“出于心灵的傲慢，他选择为自己建造一座纪念碑。不必后悔，因为所有的一切，都早就由迭代决定好了——”{n}他剧烈地咳嗽起来，你听到了他胸腔中残损金属发出的叮当声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a look of gentle condescension in Abel's eyes — strange, given the circumstances.{/n} "The hubris of the mind spurs him to build monuments to himself. Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯温和的目光中流露出了屈尊俯就的意味。考虑到眼下的情况，他的神色相当不同寻常。{/n}“出于心灵的傲慢，他选择为自己建造一座纪念碑。不必后悔，因为所有的一切，都早就由迭代决定好了——”{n}他剧烈地咳嗽起来，你听到了他胸腔中残损金属发出的叮当声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベルの目には穏やかな謙遜の念があった。それはこの状況を鑑みると奇妙なものであった。{/n}「自身の記念碑を建造したりする者は、心に傲慢さを持っているものです。どうぞ後悔なさらぬよう。全ては反復処理であらかじめ決められているのですから―」{n}ひどい咳で言葉が遮られ、彼の胸の内部からガチャンと金属を引き裂くような音が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a look of gentle condescension in Abel's eyes — strange, given the circumstances.{/n} "The hubris of the mind spurs him to build monuments to himself. Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルの目には穏やかな謙遜の念があった。それはこの状況を鑑みると奇妙なものであった。{/n}「自身の記念碑を建造したりする者は、心に傲慢さを持っているものです。どうぞ後悔なさらぬよう。全ては反復処理であらかじめ決められているのですから―」{n}ひどい咳で言葉が遮られ、彼の胸の内部からガチャンと金属を引き裂くような音が聞こえた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Abel muestran cierta condescendencia, algo extraño dadas las circunstancias.{/n} «La arrogancia de su mente le impulsa a construirse monumentos a sí mismo. No lo lamente, pues la iteración predetermina todas las cosas...». {n}Un fuerte ataque de tos le impide seguir hablando, y oyes un tintineo de metal desgarrado procedente del interior de su pecho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a look of gentle condescension in Abel's eyes — strange, given the circumstances.{/n} "The hubris of the mind spurs him to build monuments to himself. Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Abel muestran cierta condescendencia, algo extraño dadas las circunstancias.{/n} «La arrogancia de su mente le impulsa a construirse monumentos a sí mismo. No lo lamente, pues la iteración predetermina todas las cosas...». {n}Un fuerte ataque de tos le impide seguir hablando, y oyes un tintineo de metal desgarrado procedente del interior de su pecho.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abel'in gözleri, ince bir horgörünün izlerini taşıyor. Koşullar düşünüldüğünde tuhaf kaçan bir bakış bu.{/n} "Zihnin kibri, onu kendi adına anıtlar dikmeye teşvik ediyor. Vicdan azabı çekme. Zira her şey, tekerrür eliyle önceden tayin edildi..." {n}Ağır bir öksürük krizi, adamın lafını ağzına tıkıyor ve göğsünün içinden kırılan metalin tıngırtısı yükseliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is a look of gentle condescension in Abel's eyes — strange, given the circumstances.{/n} "The hubris of the mind spurs him to build monuments to himself. Do not regret, for all is predetermined by the iteration—" {n}A devastating coughing fit cuts him off, and you hear a clang of tearing metal from inside his chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel'in gözleri, koşullar göz önüne alındığında oldukça acayip duran, aheste bir horgörünün izlerini taşıyor.{/n} "Zihnin kibri, onu kendi adına anıtlar dikmeye teşvik ediyor. Vicdan azabı çekme. Zira her şey, tekerrür eliyle önceden tayin edilmiş..." {n}Ağır bir öksürük krizi, lafını yarıda kesiyor ve içinde dağılan metalin sesi, göğsünde yankılanıyor.{/n}
